item.description:
Welcome to Westborough Spirituality meeting group.

Happy Thanksgiving to everyone! Wish you all have a great family holiday.

This is a day to remind me to be grateful. Hundred years ago people shared food and took care each other so that we have this holiday. We can continue this spirit!

This month's meeting, we can share more about How to practice postive thinking and to be grateful and how do we practice in our daily life!

I would like to welcome all the friends with peaceful mind to join the discussion and sharing!

If you would like to meet more friends with the same interest about seeking a spiritual life, please come and share your thoughts and experiences about how to practice spirituality in daily life.
item.name: Westborough Spirituality November meetup
